name: frameplayer
description: Stream pixel data from video files

scripts.build: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/proto.js proto/*.proto && pbts -o src/proto.d.ts src/proto.js && tsc
scripts.prepare-example: npm run-script build && dist/cli.js prepare examples/input.mp4 -o examples/output.vpc -c examples/vidopc.json
scripts.preview-example: npm run-script build && dist/cli.js preview examples/output.vpc

author: Kevin Montag <kmontag@cs.stanford.edu>
